biography.title: About Me
biography.introduction: Passionate developer with expertise in web development and a continuous learning mindset.

education.title: Education
education.content: Training in web and mobile development, specialized in modern technologies like React, Next.js, and Node.js.

experience.title: Experience
experience.content: Over 3 years of experience in web development, working on various innovative projects.

skills.title: Skills
skills.content: Expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, Node.js, and other modern web technologies. Strong focus on UI/UX and performance.

interests.title: Interests
interests.content: Passionate about new technologies, open source, and continuous technical skill improvement.

list.0: Quality and attention to detail in every project
list.1: Continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies
